title: Bernard of Clairvaux: Man, Monk, Mystic
description: Bernard of Clairvaux has fascinated people for nearly nine hundred years. Princes and prelates asked his advice when he lived; countless readers have turned to his works for guidance since his death. Australian Cistercian Michael Casey introduces the spiritual doctrine of the saint on such topics as Imagehood, Reform, Prayer, Immediacy, Progress, and Love.
author: Michael Casey
